content.html: Just read aloud 10,000 shitty first draft words to my husband & the first thing he said when I finished: “How do you want to celebrate when that gets published?” I cannot articulate how much it means to have someone who is consistently over confident about your work. ❤️
content.value:
Just read aloud 10,000 shitty first draft words to my husband & the first thing he said when I finished: “How do you want to celebrate when that gets published?” 

I cannot articulate how much it means to have someone who is consistently over confident about your work.  ❤️
